name: Drunk it
description:
This game was created during an internal game jam with Technocité, Belgium.

In this hard time of containment, have fun with your friends playing our flying beer-pong game, score every goblets of the opposite team, shot in the mini-goblets to make them struggle, avoid the flying bottle and have fun!

GAME CONTROLS

  • Direction : move the mouse
  • Intensity : hold left click and release
